Mod description, visibile in content manager.

English: Update prop elevation on terrain change
If this is selected, prop heights will be changed to match terrain height when and where a terrain change takes place
If this is selected, props will be raised to ground level if terrain levels are raised above them
Enabling this will activate dynamic calculation of prop visibility distances based on the size of the prop, using the parameters below.
This is the maximum visibility distance that will be used if a dynamic distance cannot be calculated.
Everything will be visible within this distance, regardless of size.
Modifies the calculated visibility range - higher values mean greater visibility.
The model will transition from normal to LOD at this percentage of the maximum visibility distance.
